introduction: SYNOPSISSung-young is bored with her life with her husband Tae-yeon and daughter Seul-ah. When her divorced friend Yoon-ju, who runs a publishing company, asks her to do a story, she gladly takes the assignment. In search of the story She travels paired with third rate photographer Chun-ho. Through his impulsive ways, she soon finds herself squirming out of the boundaries that confined her. When she finds out that her husband has another woman, her dreams of the perfect marriage crumble and she succumbs to Chun-ho's tenacious courtship. But at the one year anniversary party of the publishing company, she breaks up with Chun-ho and he leaves her with the words 'I love you'.故事与她的丈夫泰贤有一个女儿的孙杨，被要求离婚，在一家经营血腥日常生活的出版公司的朋友云居。谁陪伴第三位摄影师春荷和记者孙杨，感觉自由通过冲动行为Chunho抑制自己的框架。然后，她的丈夫有一个女人，安永英发现自己爱上了春浩的执着的爱，而她的单纯的婚姻梦想崩溃了。然而，在客座记者的工作之后，出版公司一周年纪念晚会上，孙英不再和春浩见面，只留下说他爱春浩。
